information: We started growing palmaceae in 1976 in addition to growing ground nuts and citruses. VIVEROS HERNÁNDEZ provides a wide range of Mediterranean products available throughout the year. Apart from offering you quality products, we offer excellent service and every year add new items to our catalogue. We also have the strength of considerable experience abroad where we work with retail store and garden centre chains who now consider us as a trusted supplier able to handle their business in five languages.
